entry.title: Innovative Techniques To Simplify Sign-Ups and Log-Ins

div.p: Well, Smashing Magazine's Anthony T calls these innovative techniques, I would rather call them "stops complicating my shit" techniques to improve signup/login process on a website. These simple methods go a long way in simplifying a some important things and removing certain conventions which web developers have come to accept as standard even though they may not be contributing as much as they are thought. Also do not forget to check out the related Hacker News discussion
